com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon

Interface PosTaggerLexicon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Lexicon, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyLexicon, LexiconChain, LexiconFile

    public interface PosTaggerLexicon
extends Lexicon
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon, including pos-tag specific information.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<LexicalEntry> findLexicalEntries(String word, PosTag posTag)
      Find the lexical entries corresponding to a given postag for this word.
      Set<PosTag> findPossiblePosTags(String word)
      For a given word, an ordered set of all postags to be considered in tagging (using the natural ordering for postags).
      List<LexicalEntry> getEntriesForLemma(String lemma, PosTag posTag)
      Return all lexical entries for a given lemma and postag.
      List<LexicalEntry> getEntriesMatchingCriteria(LexicalEntry lexicalEntry, PosTag posTag, String gender, String number)
      Return an entry for the same lemma as the lexical entry provided, matching the criteria provided (posTag, gender, number).
      PosTagMapper getPosTagMapper()
      The PosTagMapper to use when selecting the possible pos-tags for a given lexical entry.
      PosTagSet getPosTagSet()
      The PosTagSet to use when retrieving postags for a given word.
      void setPosTagMapper(PosTagMapper posTagMapper) 
      void setPosTagSet(PosTagSet posTagSet) 

      • Methods inherited from interface com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon.Lexicon

        getEntries, getEntriesForLemma, getName

      • findPossiblePosTags

        Set<PosTag> findPossiblePosTags(String word)
        For a given word, an ordered set of all postags to be considered in tagging (using the natural ordering for postags).
        Parameters:
        word - the word being considered
        Returns:
